snippet: Chuck Hagel, a Republican former senator and President Obama’s nominee to be secretary of defense, met with sharp questions at his confirmation hearing.
abstract: Chuck Hagel, former senator and President Obama’s nominee to be secretary of defense, faces sharp and sometimes angry questioning from fellow Republicans at contentious Senate Armed Services Committee confirmation hearing; questions focus on his past statements on Iran, the influence of pro-Israel organizations in Washington and the Iraq war.

byline.contributor: Peter Baker, Mark Landler and Jennifer Steinhauer contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Chuck Hagel, a Republican former senator and President Obama’s nominee to be secretary of defense, met with sharp questions at his confirmation hearing.

headline.seo: Hagel Offers Endorsement of U.S. Military Might
headline.main: Hagel Has Rough Outing Before Ex-Colleagues
headline.print_headline: Hagel Has Rough Outing Before Ex-Colleagues

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
